## CommandContext

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/types.ts" sourceLine="28" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a command context.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandContext<T extends Interaction, Cached extends CacheType> {
    interaction: Interaction<CacheType>;
    client: Client;
    handler: CommandKit;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### interaction

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Interaction&#60;CacheType&#62;`}   />

The interaction that triggered this command.
### client

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Client`}   />

The client that instantiated this command.
### handler

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/command-kit#commandkit'>CommandKit</a>`}   />

The command data.
